description:
Etia and Ariel recieve a report stating that the user of "The Lovers" card has disappeared. While they look further into the matter, Etia gives the girls a day off. Not knowing everything that`s going on, the four girls enjoy their day off to the fullest. Meanwhile, at Sefiro Fiore, they were about to discover a new fact regarding the Daemonia...
Source: crunchyroll
